carat.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a unit for measuring how pure gold is
carat.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a unit for measuring the weight of jewels, equal to 200 milligrams
carat.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: the Orloff diamond, a stone of 194.5 carats
carat.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a measurement used to show how pure gold is
carat.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a measurement equal to 200 MILLIGRAMS on the scale of measurement for the weight of jewels
